channel.title: How to make NCPS Drop
channel.description: Well i am extending my server to an area that was never used and the ncps are there but they dont work. How do i make them work...like drops and stuff?

item.title: How to make NCPS Drop
item.dc:creator: @hey_w8_u_nub hey w8 u nub
item.description:
@hey_w8_u_nub wrote:

Open npcDrop.cfg (with notepad) there it says like:
//--------NPCID---------DropType--------Item----Amount–
the NPCID is npc’s id DropType is how many items it drops (other like obby cape whip and phat same time) item is item id amount is how many of them
[br][br][size=1]Posted on: August 10, 2008, 08:52:39 am[/size][hr]For npc putting, go to autospawn.cfg it should say:
//------NpcID—CoordX–CoordY–Height–RangeX1-RangeY1-RangeX2-RangeY2-WalkType-Descrption

like this: spawn = 1 3217 2802 0 0 0 0 0 1 Man
coords mean where it goes. Lol. do like that, put change the 1 to npc id and the coords, then make walktype to 1 and and then the last is npc name.

[br][br][size=1]Posted on: August 10, 2008, 08:55:06 am[/size][hr]for npc health and combat, go to npc.cfg looks like this:
//----NpcID-----NpcName-------------------------combat–health
example: npc = 1 Man 2 4000
1st number is npc id 2nd text is npc name 3rd number is npc combat, and last, 4th number is npc hp.

Read full topic
